properties.displayName: MCSB Baseline item DP-5 for Azure Information Protection

features.featureName: Data at Rest Encryption Using CMK
features.featureDescription: Data at-rest encryption using customer-managed keys is supported for customer content stored by the service.
features.featureGuidance: If required for regulatory compliance, organizations with an Azure Information Protection subscription can choose to configure their tenant with their own key, instead of a default key generated by Microsoft. Enable and implement data at rest encryption using customer-managed key for those services.
features.customerActionsDescription: Use customer-managed key option in data at rest encryption when required
